subject: Funerals
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The funeral for Jasper Howard, the Connecticut player stabbed last weekend, was scheduled for Miami, his hometown, on Monday so his teammates can attend. UConn plays Saturday at West Virginia. ¶The New Mexico Bowl will continue to include a team from the Mountain West Conference through 2013. The league has provided a team since the game’s inception in 2006. This year’s game is scheduled for Dec. 19. bowl.
